languages.text: "Довольно, элантах!" {n}Ирлиэт стремительно взмахивает рукой — и устройство, выбитое из вашей ладони, кувыркаясь улетает куда-то в темноту. Отдаленный затихающий стук возвещает о том, что предмет провалился куда-то в недра руин.{/n} "Я не позволю тебе своими руками уничтожить себя!"

"That is enough, elantach!" {n}Yrliet swiftly knocks the device out of your hand. It tumbles away into the darkness until a distant thud announces that it has fallen into the wreckage.{/n} "I will not allow you to destroy yourself!"
languages.original_text: "Довольно, элантах!" {n}Ирлиэт стремительно взмахивает рукой — и устройство, выбитое из вашей ладони, кувыркаясь улетает куда-то в темноту. Отдаленный затихающий стук возвещает о том, что предмет провалился куда-то в недра руин.{/n} "Я не позволю тебе своими руками уничтожить себя!"

traits.locale_text: "This is enough, elantach!" {n}Yrliet flicks her hand and knocks the device out of your palm. It tumbles away into the darkness until a distant thud announces that it has fallen down into the wreckage.{/n} "I will not allow you to destroy yourself with your own hands!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is enough, elantach!" {n}Yrliet flicks her hand and knocks the device out of your palm. It tumbles away into the darkness until a distant thud announces that it has fallen down into the wreckage.{/n} "I will not allow you to destroy yourself with your own hands!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That is enough, elantach!" {n}Yrliet swiftly knocks the device out of your hand. It tumbles away into the darkness until a distant thud announces that it has fallen into the wreckage.{/n} "I will not allow you to destroy yourself!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That is enough, elantach!" {n}Yrliet swiftly knocks the device out of your hand. It tumbles away into the darkness until a distant thud announces that it has fallen into the wreckage.{/n} "I will not allow you to destroy yourself!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That is enough, elantach!" {n}Yrliet swiftly knocks the device out of your hand. It tumbles away into the darkness until a distant thud announces that it has fallen into the wreckage.{/n} "I will not allow you to destroy yourself!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “够了，外界人！”{n}伊莉耶特迅速将你手中的装置打飞。它摇摇晃晃地消失在黑暗中，随后远处传来了“啪”地一声，掉在了无数残骸之中。{/n}“我决不能放任你自我毁灭！”
languages.original_text: "That is enough, elantach!" {n}Yrliet swiftly knocks the device out of your hand. It tumbles away into the darkness until a distant thud announces that it has fallen into the wreckage.{/n} "I will not allow you to destroy yourself!"

traits.locale_text: “够了，外界人！”{n}伊莉耶特迅速将你手中的装置打飞。它摇摇晃晃地消失在黑暗中，随后远处传来了“啪”地一声，掉在了无数残骸之中。{/n}“我决不能放任你自我毁灭！”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「もういい、エランタ！」{n}ユリエットが素早あなたの手から装置を払い落とす。装置は暗闇へと転がっていき、ガタンという音で、遠くにある残骸の上に落ちたことがわかった。{/n}「お前が自分自身を破壊するようなことは許さない！」
languages.original_text: "That is enough, elantach!" {n}Yrliet swiftly knocks the device out of your hand. It tumbles away into the darkness until a distant thud announces that it has fallen into the wreckage.{/n} "I will not allow you to destroy yourself!"

traits.locale_text: 「もういい、エランタ！」{n}ユリエットが素早あなたの手から装置を払い落とす。装置は暗闇へと転がっていき、ガタンという音で、遠くにある残骸の上に落ちたことがわかった。{/n}「お前が自分自身を破壊するようなことは許さない！」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Ça suffit, elantach ! » {n}s'exclame Yrliet en frappant l'appareil, qui vous échappe des mains et tombe dans les ténèbres jusqu'à ce qu'un bruit sourd vous apprenne qu'il est tombé dans l'épave.{/n} « Je ne vous laisserai pas vous détruire ! »
languages.original_text: "That is enough, elantach!" {n}Yrliet swiftly knocks the device out of your hand. It tumbles away into the darkness until a distant thud announces that it has fallen into the wreckage.{/n} "I will not allow you to destroy yourself!"

traits.locale_text: « Ça suffit, elantach ! » {n}s'exclame Yrliet en frappant l'appareil, qui vous échappe des mains et tombe dans les ténèbres jusqu'à ce qu'un bruit sourd vous apprenne qu'il est tombé dans l'épave.{/n} « Je ne vous laisserai pas vous détruire ! »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¡Suficiente, elantach!». {n}Yrliet arrebata rápidamente el dispositivo de tu mano. Rueda en la oscuridad hasta que un sordo golpe anuncia que ha caído entre los restos.{/n} «¡No permitiré que te destruyas!».
languages.original_text: "That is enough, elantach!" {n}Yrliet swiftly knocks the device out of your hand. It tumbles away into the darkness until a distant thud announces that it has fallen into the wreckage.{/n} "I will not allow you to destroy yourself!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Suficiente, elantach!». {n}Yrliet arrebata rápidamente el dispositivo de tu mano. Rueda en la oscuridad hasta que un sordo golpe anuncia que ha caído entre los restos.{/n} «¡No permitiré que te destruyas!».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Genug jetzt, Elantach!" {n}Yrliet schlägt dir das Gerät geschickt aus der Hand. Es rollt in die Dunkelheit, bis ein entferntes Geräusch signalisiert, dass es in das Wrack gefallen ist.{/n} "Ich werde nicht zulassen, dass Ihr Euch selbst zerstört!"
languages.original_text: "That is enough, elantach!" {n}Yrliet swiftly knocks the device out of your hand. It tumbles away into the darkness until a distant thud announces that it has fallen into the wreckage.{/n} "I will not allow you to destroy yourself!"

traits.locale_text: "Genug jetzt, Elantach!" {n}Yrliet schlägt dir das Gerät geschickt aus der Hand. Es rollt in die Dunkelheit, bis ein entferntes Geräusch signalisiert, dass es in das Wrack gefallen ist.{/n} "Ich werde nicht zulassen, dass Ihr Euch selbst zerstört!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Yeter elantach!" {n}Yrliet, hızlıca vurup cihazı elinden düşürmene sebep oluyor. Cihaz, karanlıkta yuvarlanarak enkaza düşüyor ve uzak bir gümbürtü sesi çıkarıyor.{/n} "Kendi kendini mahvetmene izin vermem!"
languages.original_text: "That is enough, elantach!" {n}Yrliet swiftly knocks the device out of your hand. It tumbles away into the darkness until a distant thud announces that it has fallen into the wreckage.{/n} "I will not allow you to destroy yourself!"
